tool_config.name: Miami-Theater-Showtimes
tool_config.description: Get current movie showtimes for Miami theaters. Can search by date, movie title, day type (today/tomorrow/weekend), or time preference (afternoon/evening/night).

movie_title.description: Movie title to search for (partial matching supported, e.g., 'spider' for 'Spider-Man')

day_type.description: Quick date filters: 'today' for current day, 'tomorrow' for next day, 'weekend' for Friday-Sunday

time_preference.description: Filter by time of day: 'afternoon' (12-5 PM), 'evening' (5-9 PM), 'night' (9 PM+)
